column5: Hi Y'all,  after a brief discussion about an hour ago via  Leechman's 'Weather ' thread....he decided i should go fishing down the end of the yard, bso i decided to see what i could get in 1 hour.   OK...OK...I'M GOING!  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i263.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid263.photobucket.com/albums/ii158/vishuscirquel/MVI_2092.flv">     I WALKED THE WHOLE 100 YRDS......ITS A REAL CHORE!  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i263.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid263.photobucket.com/albums/ii158/vishuscirquel/MVI_2094.flv">     I STARTED OFF JUST TOSSING OUT A JIG AND MINNOW FOR WALLEYE....BUT THE WEEDS WERE A PROBLEM       AFTER HALF AN HOUR AND !)LBS OF WEED.....I GOT THIS LITTL GUY ON THE JIG        AFTER ANOTHER 5LB OF WEEDS DRAGGED TO SHORE I CHANGED UP TO A FLOATING GLOW JIG AND SINKER         AFTER 15 MINUTES THIS TINY PIKE KNOCKED THE ROD CLEAN OFF MY LOG ROD REST  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i263.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid263.photobucket.com/albums/ii158/vishuscirquel/MVI_2097.flv">      THE WIND STARTED TO PICK UP AND RAIN STARTED TOO....MY HOUR WAS UP ANY WAY  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i263.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid263.photobucket.com/albums/ii158/vishuscirquel/MVI_2102.flv">      OH WELL>>>>WILL JUST HAVE TO WATCH THE SECOND HALF OF ARSENAL V WEST HAM        TYPICALLY....AS I'M WRITTING THIS THE SUN HAS COME OUT....BUT STILL RATHER BE IN HERE AS THE WIND IS REALLY HOWLING NOW       Cold...wet and very windy....but avoided the skunk!

LOL limeyangler.... No way I made you do that     just twisted your arm a little  Seriously..... why are you back in the house?..... it's sunny again    just messing with ya  Man you're so lucky to be close to water like that.... I'd be there all day in that nice little setup you have..... Looks real comfy     Not bad for an hour's work  Thanks for taking the time to put this report together..... that was a real treat  Leechman
not a problem .....as it happens...ITS SNOWING NOW!!!! a real blizzard in fact.
You should get that hard water gear inspected and ready..... won't be long now
Hundred yards? phhhht most people can cast 130
lol wild...yeah..i used to do that...just felt guilty reeling the fish across the lawn

Well i think you should install a lake camera down at your shoreline so we can keep an eye on things,that way leechman can tell you when you can go fishing,after he does all the weather checks first !!!!.  .lol..lol..lol.cheers bud,looks like you have a very nice place up there in the great white north !!!
HA!!! Great report LA!!!  I expect we should see more reports like that!  It looks like that hand is well protected in the Pike pic... is it cold up there???  Thanks for posting that one!!!

I don't think I've said this in a while...so I'll say it now.  I hate you and your backyard....LOL.  Great stuff...I think everyone here wishes for a place like yours...just head back there with a coffee in the morning and start catching fish!!
Well... looks like the perfect opportunity to rig up a clothesline to the other side of the bay and   start drop shotting!
Love yer posts,  Brilliant, really.  Sweet piece o' heaven there mate!  I don't think many have the knack for the vids like you.
